title: naTana sabhApatiyE
sahitya:
naTana sabhApatiyE arivan uyar kaDana kalaiyin perumai tillai


anupallavi

  iDadu padam tUkki iLa naghaiyuDan nOkki aDiyavar iDar nIkki
abhaya karamum varamaruL karamum ashaindAraDum


caraNam    tirumaghaL nAthan mrdanga nAdam dhIm takiTa jhaNakum enradhira
dishai mukhan tALam taLAngu taLAngu enroli sheyyap-puli patanjali magizha
vara munivarum jaya jaya vena shivakAma valliyammai iru kaNkuLira
tudiyum Damaruvum duDhum duDhum ena viri shaDaiyum puliyuDaiyum ADa manrADiya
